report-configuration.name: ConsequenceCSVReport
report-configuration.empty-message: Não existem dados para esse relatório.RowFlipCSV.
report-configuration.report-query: select c.transaction_id as "Round", y.due_date as "DueDate", r.rule_code as "Rule", a.account_number as "Account", t.attr_name as "Header", t.attr_value as "Value" from bck_rule r, bck_consequence c, bck_account_dm a, bck_cycle_dm y, bck_consequence_attr t where r.rule_code=$P{RULE_CODE} and y.due_date =$P{DUE_DATE} and r.objid = c.rule_uid and c.account_uid = a.objid and c.cycle_uid = y.objid and t.CONSEQUENCE_UID = c.objid order by c.transaction_id, y.due_date,r.rule_code, a.account_number, t.attr_name
